results.title: Metformin Reduces Blood Glucose in Treatment-Naive Type 2 Diabetes by Altering the Gut Microbiome.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment caused a significant reduction in Megamonas and @<m>DISEASE_Klebsiella_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007710 @@@Klebsiella@@@.
